title: Kennen
body: Hi, does anyone know what you play into Kennen top lane

replies.body:
Look at who he's countered by. https://lolalytics.com/ranked/worldwide/9.16/platinum/plus/champion/Kennen/Top/
I'd roll with Mordekaiser because his ability to farm from a range means Klepto Kennen wouldn't be able to auto you as much. The results would be he gets less gold and you take less damage, thus you have an easier time outscaling him. You should quickly get to the point where locking him in R is a kill if you can land your skillshots.

If Mord is a counter to Kennen then so is Darius by the same logic. The problem is that Kennen is one of the most notorious counters to Darius and would therefore be one of the hardest counters to Mord (Which makes sense because Mord has the same problem dealing with poke that Darius and any other juggernaut does).

Don't just read something and assume it's true. Use your brain.

> Don't just read something and assume it's true. Use your brain.

You say that as if I'm vomiting out an opinion. Those are raw stats with reasoning to back it. Stronger reasoning than your own because Morde has more range & lockdown than a Darius.

> [{quoted}](name=R0ses R Red,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ocJN2wHM,comment-id=000100000001,timestamp=2019-08-30T22:51:42.892+0000)
>
> You say that as if I'm vomiting out an opinion. Those are raw stats with reasoning to back it. Stronger reasoning than your own because Morde has more range & lockdown than a Darius.

Except that no he doesn't. Mord is just as susceptible to ranged harass as Darius is

> [{quoted}](name=BlackKnightJack,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ocJN2wHM,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2019-08-30T12:19:12.480+0000)
>
> If Mord is a counter to Kennen then so is Darius by the same logic. The problem is that Kennen is one of the most notorious counters to Darius and would therefore be one of the hardest counters to Mord (Which makes sense because Mord has the same problem dealing with poke that Darius and any other juggernaut does).
> 
> Don't just read something and assume it's true. Use your brain.

Morde's Q has 200 more range than Darius' and Morde's E has 360 more range than Darius'. Morde can also have defense and sustain without hitting Kennen. Those are all big differences.

Though I agree that Morde probably doesn't counter Kennen
Mord's Q is also a much easier skillshot to dodge as is his pull.
